WorkItem.Description: I was trying to figure out why Fire mages were not picking up Phylactery of the Nameless Lich as a valid trinket when I realized the special effect was not modeled. The closest effect tigger I could think of for the effect was DotTick. However the mage model appears to not support that effect.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Needs to support DoTTick trigger for a Periodic Damage effect

Comments.Message: I was going through the other modules, and it appears that only the enhancement shaman module is the only one that supports DoTTick. Should there be a universal event trigger for periodic Damage?
I just did a Find All References on DoTTick and there's usage in Bear, Car, DPSDK, DPSWarr, Elemental, Enhance, Hunter, Moonkin, ProtPaladin, ProtWarr, Rogue, Shadow, TankDK, Warlock
